description: Heavy shelling persists despite calls from world powers to halt the fighting over a disputed region.
title: Armenia-Azerbaijan: Both sides defy Nagorno-Karabakh ceasefire calls
title_page: Armenia-Azerbaijan: Both sides defy Nagorno-Karabakh ceasefire calls - BBC News
maintext: BBC Arabic earlier this week spoke to a man who said he had been recruited in northern Syria and sent via Turkey to fight in the conflict. Abdullah - not his real name - said he had been sent to Nagorno-Karabakh "wearing Azerbaijani uniform" soon after the fighting broke out.
